title: Ever notice how everything is getting more boring?
body: Riot's balance policy is just to nerf everything that is just a little stronger than other things{{champion:121}} . Never buff weak champions{{champion:6}} . Then previously-mediocre champions are too strong, and get nerfed{{champion:18}} . Then previously-weak champions are too strong, get nerfed {{champion:16}}. Cycle continues to repeat. Now, in season 5, everything is samey and bland.
